enrolled-dateline.#text: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday, the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text: To temporarily increase the borrowing authority of the Federal Emergency Management Agency for carrying out the National Flood Insurance Program.

role.#text: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.

header.#text: TEMPORARY INCREASE IN BORROWING AUTHORITY FOR NATIONAL FLOOD INSURANCE PROGRAM

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1309(a) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: as an emergency requirement pursuant to
, the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2010, and as an emergency pursuant to
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 403(a) of S. Con. Res. 13 (111th Congress)

text.#text: The amount provided by this section is designated by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 4(g) of the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: HR 41 ENR: To temporarily increase the borrowing authority of the Federal Emergency Management Agency for carrying out the National Flood Insurance Program.
